data.name: Satyr [Q]
data.description:
Units:
+10% spell resist
-10% hit points

Buildings:
+5% attack rate
+2 armor

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Damage

Magic:
Cursed Power (25% to do 1.5x damage)
Void Rain (Deals 100 damage in 200 AoE)
Shadow Word DEATH (Kills an enemy unit)

Traits: The power of demons has increased their resistance to magic, and the flesh of their enemies will fertilize the cursed forests in which they habit. Their strength is growing every minute, be afraid!

Difficulty: Expert

auras.name: Trade Routes Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Devotion Aura
auras.description:

(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Inspiration Aura
auras.description:
+20% unit damage
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Good Commander [S]
bonuses.description:

Satyr Leader replaces Knight Of Nightmares
Siege Unit

+150 HP

(20-32% to deal 20-40 damage in 175 AoE)

Curse Blade
Corrupted Armor
Cursed Blood

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

Corrupted Armor
Cursed Blood

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.name: Guardians Of The Cursed Forest [Z]
bonuses.description:

+1 level of Fertile Ground

Siege Unit (Melee)
+60% attack rate
+1200 HP
+3 armor
Abilities:

(60 damage to melee attacker)
Strong Bark (Passive Skill)
(60% spell damage reduction)
(24% to block an attack)
Organic Harvest (Passive Skill)
(restore 50 HP on kill)
(affects organic units only)
Upgrades used:
Corrupted Branches
Corrupted Armor
Phantom Power

Type: Late Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Source of Magic [C]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Battle Rage

Icreases Corrupted Tree Of Life and Defiler mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Corrupted Tree Of Life spells by 30%.

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

towerUpgrades.name: Battle Rage
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: boost to your standing forces
Affects: Killed enemy Heroes
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +20% damage for 60 seconds
Lv2: +40% damage for 120 seconds
Lv3: +60% damage for 180 seconds
Lv4: +80% damage for 240 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Shadow Armor
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor increase ability
Affects: Defiler

Lv1: +3 armor for 60 seconds
Lv2: +6 armor for 80 seconds
Lv3: +9 armor for 100 seconds
Lv4: +12 armor for 120 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Toxic Fire
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Nightmare Dragon

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 2 seconds
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 3 seconds
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 4 seconds
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 5 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Lust for Power
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: unit spawning rate
Affects: All Barracks

Lv1: +5% spawning rate
Lv2: +10% spawning rate
Lv3: +15% spawning rate
Lv4: +20% spawning rate

towerUpgrades.name: Phantom Power
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and attack rate
Affects: Trickster and Ballista

Lv1: +4 and +12 damage, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +8 and +24 damage, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +12 and +36 damage, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +16 and +48 damage, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Cursed Blood
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: health regeneration and HP
Affects: Soul Stealer, Trickster, Defiler and Knight Of Nigntmares

Lv1: +1.5 HP/s, +25 HP
Lv2: +3 HP/s, +50 HP
Lv3: +4.5 HP/s, +75 HP
Lv4: +6 HP/s, +100 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Instilling Fear
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to kill units
Affects: Knight Of Nightmares
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 5% chance on each attack
Lv2: 10% chance on each attack
Lv3: 15% chance on each attack
Lv4: 20% chance on each attack

towerUpgrades.name: Critical Strike
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Corrupted Ancient Protector and Ballista

Lv1: 10% to do 2.5x damage
Lv2: 20% to do 2.5x damage
Lv3: 30% to do 2.5x damage
Lv4: 40% to do 2.5x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Fertile Ground
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to spawn a Spoiled Treant
Affects: Your dying units

Lv1: 10% chance, has Entangled Roots
deals 20/40/60/80 dmg, 2/4/6/8 sec stun
Lv2: 12% chance, has Cripple
reduces unit's damage by 20%/40%/60%
Lv3: 14% chance, has Spoilage
reduces unit's armor by 6/12
Lv4: 16% chance, has Recovery
10% chance to spawn a Plague Treant

t1spell.name: Prickly Roots [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 300 damage in 170 AoE.
Stuns for 8 seconds.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Decay Aura [X]
t2spell.description:
Creates Decay Aura over your base.
Deals 70 damage/sec for 18s.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: Nightmare Lord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Howl of Terror (Disable Spell)
12-30% damage reduction
(affects organic units only)
(45 second cooldown)

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
15-27% for 120-240 area damage

Death Pact (Self Spell)
kills an ally, heals for 90-150% of it's HP
(affects non-Hero units only)
(affects organic units only)
(20 second cooldown)

Demonic Fortitude (Self Spell)
100% damage reduction for 6-12s
(75 second cooldown)

heroes.description:

Weak Vs Buildings

summons 2 Spirits for 60-90s
(100 second cooldown)

10-70% to spawn Skeleton Warrior on kill
(affects organic units only)
(40 second life)

Dark Ritual (Summoning Spell)
kills a unit, gains 9-15% of it's HP as mana
(killed unit becomes ally Skeleton Warrior)
(30 second cooldown)

Army Of The Dead (Summoning Spell)
summons 4-10 Skeleton Warriors
(80 second cooldown)
